title: ‘We Will Be One of the Favorites’: UAE Emirates-XRG Not Missing Pogačar Ahead of Omloop Brawl With Van Aert, Pidcock
content:
Emirati 'super team' bullish on cobblestone chances for Omloop and Kuurne as Wellens, Politt, Narváez, Morgado bring mass offensive to the 'opening weekend.'

Read the full article at ‘We Will Be One of the Favorites’: UAE Emirates-XRG Not Missing Pogačar Ahead of Omloop Brawl With Van Aert, Pidcock on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
